1.text: Beloved, believe not every spirit, but try the spirits whether they are of God: because many false prophets are gone out into the world.

2.text: Hereby know you the Spirit of God: Every spirit that confesses that Jesus Christ is come in the flesh is of God:

3.text: And every spirit that confesses not that Jesus Christ is come in the flesh is not of God: and this is that spirit of antichrist, whereof you have heard that it should come; and even now already is it in the world.

4.text: You are of God, little children, and have overcome them: because greater is he that is in you, than he that is in the world.

5.text: They are of the world: therefore speak they of the world, and the world hears them.

6.text: We are of God: he that knows God hears us; he that is not of God hears not us. Hereby know we the spirit of truth, and the spirit of error.

7.text: Beloved, let us love one another: for love is of God; and every one that loves is born of God, and knows God.

8.text: He that loves not knows not God; for God is love.

9.text: In this was manifested the love of God toward us, because that God sent his only begotten Son into the world, that we might live through him.

10.text: Herein is love, not that we loved God, but that he loved us, and sent his Son to be the propitiation for our sins.

11.text: Beloved, if God so loved us, we ought also to love one another.

12.text: No man has seen God at any time. If we love one another, God dwells in us, and his love is perfected in us.

13.text: Hereby know we that we dwell in him, and he in us, because he has given us of his Spirit.

14.text: And we have seen and do testify that the Father sent the Son to be the Savior of the world.

15.text: Whoever shall confess that Jesus is the Son of God, God dwells in him, and he in God.

16.text: And we have known and believed the love that God has to us. God is love; and he that dwells in love dwells in God, and God in him.

17.text: Herein is our love made perfect, that we may have boldness in the day of judgment: because as he is, so are we in this world.

18.text: There is no fear in love; but perfect love casts out fear: because fear has torment. He that fears is not made perfect in love.

19.text: We love him, because he first loved us.

20.text: If a man say, I love God, and hates his brother, he is a liar: for he that loves not his brother whom he has seen, how can he love God whom he has not seen?

21.text: And this commandment have we from him, That he who loves God love his brother also.
